lead_paragraph: James L. Dolan, the owner of the Knicks and the Rangers and the chairman of Cablevision, put on gray fedora, grabbed a guitar and morphed into JD, the lead singer of JD and the Straight Shot.
snippet: James L. Dolan, the owner of the Knicks and the Rangers and the chairman of Cablevision, put on gray fedora, grabbed a guitar and morphed into JD, the lead singer of JD and the Straight Shot.
